name: Noting Job
description:
You got the worst job listing you could find, but atleast it pays decently, right? After accepting the job, you're a target for an unknown entity. You're not aware of it, but IT is aware of you. You have 3 ways your life will end up; dying, surviving and dying... Again. Make the right choices and you'll survive!

This game is under development, and not finished yet. It will appear on this page once completed.
